attributes.action: To stop Internet Service Providers like Virgin Media from controlling the flow of traffic to suit financial gain and political agenda.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned believe that the control of information of any kind via the internet is a complete violation of our freedom of speech.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
